questions.question: কোন বানানটি ঠিক?
questions.explanation: কতিপয় শুদ্ধ বানান: সত্তা, সত্ত্বেও, সরস্বতী, স্বতঃস্ফূর্ত, স্বত্ব, স্বাতন্ত্র্য, স্বায়ত্তশাসন, সাত্ত্বিক, সদ্যোজাত, স্পৃশ্য, স্ফুরণ, স্ফূর্তি, স্বকীয়, স্বদেশি, স্থায়িত্ব, স্থবির।

questions.question: 'নবযৌবন' কোন সমাস?
questions.explanation: বিশেষণ বা বিশেষণভাবাপন্ন পদের সাথে বিশেষ্য বা বিশেষ্যভাবাপন্ন পদের যে সমাস হয় এবং পরপদের অর্থই প্রধান রূপে প্রতীয়মান হয়, তাকে কর্মধারয় সমাস বলে। যেমন: নীল যে পদ্ম = নীলপদ্ম, নব যে যৌবন = নবযৌবন।

questions.question: যা চেটে খেতে হয়' এক কথায় কী হবে?
questions.explanation: কতিপয় এক কথায় প্রকাশ: যা পান করার যোগ্য- পেয়, চর্বণ করে খাওয়া যায় যা- চর্ব্য, চুষে খাওয়া যায় যা- চুষ্য, যা জল দেয়- জলদ, যা ক্রয় করার যোগ্য- ক্রেয়।

questions.question: কোন বাক্যটিতে কর্ম কারকে শূন্য বিভক্তির উদাহরণ দেওয়া হয়েছে?
questions.explanation: যাকে আশ্রয় করে কর্তা ক্রিয়া সম্পন্ন করে তাকে কর্মকারক বলে। যেমন: পুলিশ ডাক।

questions.question: 'বৈকালী' গল্পটি কার রচনা?
'মর্সিয়া' শব্দের অর্থ:
questions.explanation: আরবি 'মর্সিয়া' শব্দের অর্থ 'শোকগীতি। ইসলাম : পুনর্জাগরণবাদী কবি ফররুখ আহমদের বিখ্যাত 'পাঞ্জেরি' কবিতায় শব্দটির ব্যবহার হয়েছে।

questions.question: 'মাতৃহৃদয়ের পক্ষপাতিত্ব নাই। তবে কেমন করিয়া বলিব, ঈশ্বর পক্ষপাতী?' উদ্ধৃতিটি কোন গদ্যাংশ থেকে নেওয়া হয়েছে?
questions.explanation: অর্ধাঙ্গী' প্রবন্ধটি রোকেয়ার 'মতিচুর' নামক প্রবন্ধের প্রথম খণ্ড থেকে নেওয়া হয়েছে। 'অর্ধাঙ্গী' প্রবন্ধটি ১৩১১ সনের আশ্বিন সংখ্যায় 'নবনূর' পত্রিকায় প্রথম প্রকাশিত হয়।

questions.question: মনীষা' এর সন্ধিবিচ্ছেদ-
questions.explanation: কতিপয় নিপাতনে সিদ্ধ সংস্কৃত ব্যঞ্জনসন্ধি: আ + চর্য = আশ্চর্য আ + পদ = আস্পদ পর্ + পর = পরস্পর ষট্ + দশ = ষোড়শ বৃহৎ + পতি = বৃহস্পতি গো + পদ = গোষ্পদ পতৎ + অঞ্জলি = পতঞ্জলি তদ্‌ + কর = তক্ষর

questions.question: 'উগ্র' এর বিপরীতার্থক শব্দ কোনটি?
questions.explanation: কতিপয় বিপরীত শব্দ প্রদত্ত শব্দ বিপরীত শব্দ প্রদত্ত শব্দ বিপরীত শব্দ স্বতন্ত্র পরতন্ত্র স্থাণু চলিষ্ণু স্নিগ্ধ রুক্ষ সচেষ্ট নিশ্চেষ্ট

questions.question: 'রিক্সা' শব্দটির উৎস কোন ভাষা?
questions.explanation: জুড়ো, ক্যারাটে, হারাকিরি' জাপানি শব্দ।

questions.question: His listeners enjoyed his trenchant wit but his victims often winced its satire.
questions.explanation: Wince at ব্যাথায় কুঁকড়ে যাওয়া।

questions.question: Which of the following sentences is CORRECT?

options.label: ক
options.text: The factory workers were ready, able and were quite determined to do a great job.

options.label: খ
options.text: The computer network is safter, stronger, and more secure.

options.label: গ
options.text: Martin felt the movie was boring, silly and was too long.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: In counseling, I think both talking and tolisten are important

questions.option_a: The factory workers were ready, able and were quite determined to do a great job.
questions.option_b: The computer network is safter, stronger, and more secure.
questions.option_c: Martin felt the movie was boring, silly and was too long.
questions.option_d: In counseling, I think both talking and tolisten are important
questions.explanation: Parallelism এর নিয়ম অনুযায়ী কোনো sentence এ একই parts of speech একাধিকবার ব্যবহৃত হলে এরা same form, same structure, same tense এ হয়।

questions.question: She mentions —— at El Paso in her letter.
questions.explanation: কিছু verb আছে সেগুলোর পর সর্বদা gerund (verb + ing) বসে। সে verb গুলো হলো- Admit, appreciate, avoid, complete, consider, delay, deny, discuss, enjoy, finish, keep, mention, miss, postpone, practice, quit, recall, recommend, regret, risk, stop, suggest, tolerate, understand ইত্যাদি।

questions.question: He abstains - liquor
questions.explanation: Abstain from বিরত থাকা।

questions.question: Which of the following sentences is CORRECT?

options.label: ক
options.text: She had never consider a tattoo until several of her friends got them

options.label: খ
options.text: Dermatologists have seen the development of a new trend toward tattoo removal.

options.label: গ
options.text: Jessie's best friend liked the tattoo, but her mother faints.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Today, doctors using laser light to break up the ink molecules in the skin.

questions.option_a: She had never consider a tattoo until several of her friends got them
questions.option_b: Dermatologists have seen the development of a new trend toward tattoo removal.
questions.option_c: Jessie's best friend liked the tattoo, but her mother faints.
questions.option_d: Today, doctors using laser light to break up the ink molecules in the skin.
questions.explanation: Correct answer: খ Dermatologists have seen the development of a new trend toward tattoo removal. Reason: This sentence is grammatically correct and properly constructed. Why the others are incorrect: ক: consider → should be considered (verb tense error). গ: liked (past) vs faints (present) → tense inconsistency. ঘ: Missing auxiliary verb → should be are using .

questions.question: Turn into the indirect form of speech: He said to me, "Did you call the doctor?"

options.label: ক
options.text: He asked me if I was calling the doctor.

options.label: খ
options.text: He asked me had I called the doctor.

options.label: গ
options.text: He asked me if I had called the doctor.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: He asked to me if I called the doctor.

questions.option_a: He asked me if I was calling the doctor.
questions.option_b: He asked me had I called the doctor.
questions.option_c: He asked me if I had called the doctor.
questions.option_d: He asked to me if I called the doctor.

questions.question: Opposite of "LUCID".
questions.explanation: Lucid (স্পষ্ট, সহজবোধ্য) এর বিপরীত শব্দ abstruse (দুর্বোধ্য)।

questions.question: The meaning of "BILATERAL" is:
questions.explanation: Bilateral দ্বিপাক্ষিক (two-sided) ।

questions.question: One of the least effective ways of storing information is learning - it.
questions.explanation: কিছু verb আছে যেগুলোর পর সর্বদা infinitive বসে (to + verb)। সেগুলো হলো- Agree, appear, arrange, ask, claim consent, decide, demand, expect, fail, hesitate, intend, learn manage, mean, wait, want ইত্যাদি।

questions.question: Opposite of "TENACIOUS".
questions.explanation: Tenacious (একগুঁয়ে, নাছোরবান্দা) এর বিপরীত শব changing (পরিবর্তনশীল)।

questions.question: His house is near the temple. The underlined word is :
questions.explanation: In the sentence “His house is near the temple.” , the underlined word “near” is functioning as a preposition , because it shows the relationship between house and temple . Correct answer: ঘ — Preposition

questions.question: You are to colour this picture. The passive form :

options.label: ক
options.text: This picture has to be coloured by you.

options.label: খ
options.text: This picture is to be colour by you.

options.label: গ
options.text: This picture is to be coloured by you.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: This picture is ping coloured by you.

questions.option_a: This picture has to be coloured by you.
questions.option_b: This picture is to be colour by you.
questions.option_c: This picture is to be coloured by you.
questions.option_d: This picture is ping coloured by you.

questions.question: Hyde park, the family estate of Roosevelt, - on the top of: bluff overlooking.
questions.explanation: অতীত নির্দেশ থাকায় sat হয়েছে।

questions.question: Strauss finished —- two of his pubilshed composition before his tenth birthday.
questions.explanation: কিছু verb আছে সেগুলোর পর সর্বদা gerund (verb ing) বসে। সে verb গুলো হলো- Admit, appreciate, avoid complete, consider, delay, deny, discuss, enjoy, finish, keep mention, miss, postpone, practice, quit, recall, recommend regret, risk, stop, suggest, tolerate, understand ইত্যাদি।

questions.question: To lead a well balanced life, you need to have othel interests —— studying
questions.explanation: Remember that besides means in addition to (এছাড়াও), Beside means near (পাশে)।

questions.question: The word "OSCILLATE" means
questions.explanation: Oscillate দুলতে থাকা (vibrate) whirl - দ্রুতবেগে সশব্দে ঘুরানো; turn ঘুরানো; confuse হতবুদ্ধি করা।

questions.question: We haven't seen him - almost a year.
questions.explanation: Present Perfect Tense এ সময়ের পরিমাণ (duration of time) বুঝাতে for এবং শুরুর সময় বুঝাতে since (beginning time) বসে।

questions.question: Overindulgence - character as well as physical stamina.
questions.explanation: Strengthens শক্তিশালী করা; Stimulates উত্তেজিত করা; Debilitates - দুর্বল করা; Maintains - বজায় রাখা।

questions.question: You must hurry, or for will miss the bus. The complex form of this compound sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: If you do not hurry you will miss the bus.

options.label: খ
options.text: If you not hurry you will miss the bus

options.label: গ
options.text: If you do not hurry the bus will miss

options.label: ঘ
options.text: If you not hurry the bus will miss.

questions.option_a: If you do not hurry you will miss the bus.
questions.option_b: If you not hurry you will miss the bus
questions.option_c: If you do not hurry the bus will miss
questions.option_d: If you not hurry the bus will miss.
questions.explanation: A ছাড়া বাকি সবগুলোই ভুল structure এ আছে।

questions.question: — the moon influences only one kind of tide is not generally known.
questions.explanation: যে সকল Noun clause that দ্বারা শুরু হয় তাকে Nominal that clause বলে। Nominal that clause কোনো verb এর subject হিসেবে কাজ করে। এখানে, that হচ্ছে subject আর is হচ্ছে verb.

questions.question: Which of the following sentences is CORRECT?

options.label: ক
options.text: Forty miles is a long way

options.label: খ
options.text: One dozen of bananas are sufficient

options.label: গ
options.text: One of the boys are absent.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: I, Habib and you are guilty.

questions.option_a: Forty miles is a long way
questions.option_b: One dozen of bananas are sufficient
questions.option_c: One of the boys are absent.
questions.option_d: I, Habib and you are guilty.
questions.explanation: Amount of time, money, distance সর্বদা singular verb গ্রহণ করে। B হবে না কারণ subject singular কিন্তু verb plural. C হবে না কারণ one of the + plural noun + singular verb. D হবে না কারণ ভুল স্বীকার বুঝাতে pronoun 1, 2, 3 (1st, 2nd ও 3rd Person) ক্রম মেনে চলে।

questions.question: The word "PRODIGIOUS" means:
questions.explanation: Prodigious বিশাল বা বিস্ময়কর (enormous)।

options.label: খ
options.text: A bird was stalked by a cat in my garden.

options.label: গ
options.text: In my garden a bird was stalked by a cat.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: A bird was being stalked by a cat in my garden.

questions.option_a: A bird was being stalking by a cat in my garden.
questions.option_b: A bird was stalked by a cat in my garden.
questions.option_c: In my garden a bird was stalked by a cat.
questions.option_d: A bird was being stalked by a cat in my garden.

questions.question: Turn into the indirect form of speech: Nita said, "I did not play yesterday."

options.text: Nita said that she had not played yesterday.

options.label: খ
options.text: Nita said that she did not played yesterday

questions.option_b: Nita said that she did not played yesterday
questions.option_c: Nita told that she did not played yesterday.
questions.option_d: Nita told that she had played yesterday.

questions.question: He bought his friend's pen. The complex form of this simple sentence is:

options.label: ক
options.text: He bought the pen which belongs to his friend.

options.label: খ
options.text: He bought the pen which belonged to his friend.

options.label: গ
options.text: He has bought the pen which belongs to his friend.

options.label: ঘ

questions.option_a: He bought the pen which belongs to his friend.
questions.option_b: He bought the pen which belonged to his friend.
questions.option_c: He has bought the pen which belongs to his friend.
questions.option_d: He bought the pen which belonged to his friend's one.
questions.explanation: Complex sentence এ clause marker/ conjunction এর আগে এবং পরে সাধারণত একই tense ব্যবহৃত হয়।

questions.question: We must study well to pass the exam. The compound form of this simple sentence is:

options.text: We must study and we will pass.

options.label: গ
options.text: We must study otherwise we will fail.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: We must study, or we cannot pass

questions.option_a: We must study, or we may not pass.
questions.option_b: We must study and we will pass.
questions.option_c: We must study otherwise we will fail.
questions.option_d: We must study, or we cannot pass
questions.explanation: Compound sentence and, but, or দ্বারা যুক্ত থাকে।

questions.option_a: Has the picture not been seen by him?
questions.option_b: Has not the picture been seen by him?

questions.option_d: Have the picture not been seen by him?

questions.question: Opposite of "SUBSTANTIATE".
questions.explanation: Substantiate (সত্যতা প্রমাণ করা) এর বিপরীত শব্দ disprove (ভুল প্রমাণ করা)। Reveal প্রদর্শন; integrate - একত্র করা।

options.label: গ
options.text: I have no advice offering to you

options.label: ঘ

questions.option_b: I have no advice to offer you.

questions.question: Pick up the INCORRECT sentence:

options.label: ক
options.text: How long did you live in London?

options.label: গ

questions.option_b: When you were in Japan did you eat sushi?
questions.option_c: When I was six I have broken my arm.
questions.option_d: I have never been to Brazil.
questions.explanation: Sequence tense এর নিয়ম অনুযায়ী Principal clause Past Tense এ হলে subordinate clause অবশ্যই Past Tense এ হবে।

questions.question: Although they are smaller, chipmunks are - most other ground squirrels.
questions.explanation: Like is used between the two nouns compared, and alike is used after the two nouns or a plural noun I noun like noun noun noun alike noun alike —

questions.question: Either of the two girls will be awarded. The underlined word is:
questions.explanation: Sentence এর শুরুতে either বসলে এটি pronoun এর কাজ করে।

questions.question: Pick up the INCORRECT sentence:

options.label: ক
options.text: Justice, as well as mercy, allows it.

options.label: খ
options.text: Each of the sisters are clever.

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Neither he nor I was there.

questions.option_a: Justice, as well as mercy, allows it.
questions.option_b: Each of the sisters are clever.
questions.option_d: Neither he nor I was there.
questions.explanation: Each, every দিয়ে sentence শুরু হলে verb টি সর্বদা singular হয় তাই এখানে are না হয়ে is হবে।

questions.question: Good computers are getting quite cheaper now. The underlined word is:
questions.explanation: যে word noun/pronoun কে modify করে তাকে adjective বলে। এখানে cheaper, computers কে modify করেছে তাই এটি adjective।

questions.question: If you rearrange the letters "GNATREANI" you have the name of a (n):
questions.explanation: GNATREANI = ARGENTINA = Country

questions.question: If all Bloops are Razzies and all Razzies are Lazzies, then all Bloops are definitely Lazzies?
questions.explanation: If all Bloops are Razzies and all Razzies are Lazzies, then all Bloops are definitely Lazzies | It is true statement.

questions.question: Which one of the following things is the least like the others?
questions.explanation: Poem, novel, status এগুলো সবই মানুষের সৃষ্টি কিন্তু flower সৃষ্টিকর্তার সৃষ্টি তাই এটি অন্যগুলো হতে আলাদা।

questions.question: Who is Hina Rabbani Khar?

options.label: ঘ
options.text: Secretary general of International Human Right Commission

questions.option_d: Secretary general of International Human Right Commission

questions.question: What is the elaboration of BIA?
questions.explanation: BIA (Bangladesh Insurance Academy) ১৯৭৩ সালে প্রতিষ্ঠিত হয়। এটি বিমার পেশাগত উন্নয়নের জন্য উল্লেখযোগ্য ভূমিকা রাখছে।

questions.question: Who is the prime minister of Australia?

questions.question: Ralph likes 25 but not 24; he likes 400 but not 300; he likes 144 but not 145. Which does he like:
questions.explanation: এখানে, , 25 = 5 2 25=5^{2} 25 = 5 2 যা পূর্ণ বর্গ ক্নি 24 পূর্ণ বর্গ নয়। 400 = 20² যা পূর্ণ বর্গ কিন্তু 300 পূর্ণ বর্গ নয়। 144 = 122 যা পূর্ণ বর্গ কিন্তু 145 পূর্ণ বর্গ নয়। আর Answer Option গুলোর মধ্যে 1600 = 40² ছাড়া আর কোনটিই পূর্ণ বর্গ নয়।

questions.question: A standard Veggiematik machine can chop 36 carrots in 4 minutes. How many carrots can 6 standard Veggiematik machines chop in 6 minutes? (একটি ভালোমানের ভেজিম্যাটিক মেশিন ৪ মিনিটে ৩৬টি গাজর কাঁটতে পারে। তাহলে ৬ মিনিটে ৬টি ভ্যাজিমেটিক মেশিন কতটি গাজর কাঁটতে পারবে?)
questions.explanation: In 4 minutes A machine can chop 36 carrots In 4 minutes A machine can chop 36 4 \frac{36}{4} 4 36 ​ In 4 minutes A machine can chop 36 × 6 4 = 54 \frac{36 \times 6}{4} =54 4 36 × 6 ​ = 54 In 4 minutes 6 machine can chop 6 x 54 carrots = 324 carrots

questions.question: Alan has been ill and worked only 3 / 5 3 / 5 3/5 of his usual 40 -hour week. He makes $ 13.85 \mathbf{\$ 1 3 . 8 5} $13.85 an hour. How much has he earned this week?
questions.explanation: Total worked  = 3 5  of  40  in week  = 3 5 × 40 = 24  in week  \begin{aligned} \text { Total worked } & =\frac{3}{5} \text { of } 40 \text { in week } \\ & =\frac{3}{5} \times 40=24 \text { in week } \end{aligned}  Total worked  ​ = 5 3 ​  of  40  in week  = 5 3 ​ × 40 = 24  in week  ​ An hour, he makes $ 13.85 \$ 13.85 $13.85 ∴ 24 \therefore 24 ∴ 24 hours, He makes $ 13.85 × 24 = $ 332.40 \$ 13.85 \times 24=\$ 332.40 $13.85 × 24 = $332.40

questions.explanation: B's average speed = 300 3 × 5 =\frac{300}{3 \times 5} = 3 × 5 300 ​ = 20 =20 = 20 miles per hours

questions.question: If the area of a circle is 817, then the circumference of the circle is:
questions.explanation: ধরি, বৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধ = r =\mathrm{r} = r , ক্ষেত্রফল = π r 2 =\pi \mathrm{r}^{2} = π r 2 ∴ π r 2 = 81 π ⇒ r 2 = 81 ⇒ r = 9 \begin{array}{l} \therefore \pi r^{2}=81 \pi \\ \Rightarrow r^{2}=81 \Rightarrow r=9 \end{array} ∴ π r 2 = 81 π ⇒ r 2 = 81 ⇒ r = 9 ​ ∴ \therefore ∴ বৃত্তের পরিসীমা = 2 π r = 2 × 9 × π = 18 π =2 \pi r=2 \times 9 \times \pi=18 \pi = 2 π r = 2 × 9 × π = 18 π

questions.question: If you multiply the height of a cylinder by 9 , by what must you multiply the radius if the volume is to stay the same.
questions.explanation: We know, the volume of cylinder = π r 2   h = 9 9 π r 2   h = π ( r 3 ) 2 9 h =\pi r^{2} \mathrm{~h}=\frac{9}{9} \pi r^{2} \mathrm{~h}=\pi\left(\frac{r}{3}\right)^{2} 9 h = π r 2   h = 9 9 ​ π r 2   h = π ( 3 r ​ ) 2 9 h We have to multiply the radius by 1 3 \frac{1}{3} 3 1 ​ to stay the volume same.

questions.question: Two integers are in the ratio of 1 to 4 . If 6 is added to the smaller number, the ratio becomes 1 to 2 . Find the larger integer.
questions.explanation: Let, Two integers are x x x and y [ y > x ] y[y>x] y [ y > x ] ∴ x : y = 1 : 4 ⇒ x y = 1 4 ⇒ y = 4 x  আবার,  ( x + 6 ) : y = 1 : 2 ⇒ x + 6 y = 1 2 ⇒ x + 6 4 x = 1 2 ⇒ 4 x = 2 x + 12 ⇒ 2 x = 12 ⇒ x = 6 ∴ y = 4 x = 4 × 6 = 24 \begin{array}{l} \therefore \mathrm{x}: \mathrm{y}=1: 4 \Rightarrow \frac{x}{y}=\frac{1}{4} \Rightarrow \mathrm{y}=4 \mathrm{x} \\ \text { আবার, }(\mathrm{x}+6): \mathrm{y}=1: 2 \Rightarrow \frac{x+6}{y}=\frac{1}{2} \\ \Rightarrow \frac{x+6}{4 x}=\frac{1}{2} \\ \Rightarrow 4 \mathrm{x}=2 \mathrm{x}+12 \\ \Rightarrow 2 \mathrm{x}=12 \Rightarrow \mathrm{x}=6 \\ \therefore y=4 x=4 \times 6=24 \end{array} ∴ x : y = 1 : 4 ⇒ y x ​ = 4 1 ​ ⇒ y = 4 x   আবার ,  ( x + 6 ) : y = 1 : 2 ⇒ y x + 6 ​ = 2 1 ​ ⇒ 4 x x + 6 ​ = 2 1 ​ ⇒ 4 x = 2 x + 12 ⇒ 2 x = 12 ⇒ x = 6 ∴ y = 4 x = 4 × 6 = 24 ​

questions.question: Which of the following is a solution to the equation, x 2 − 4 x − 32 = 0 x^{2}-4 x-32=0 x 2 − 4 x − 32 = 0 ?
What is the smallest of six consecutive odd integers whose average (arithmetic mean) is x + 2 x+2 x + 2 ?
questions.explanation: The sum of six consecutive odd integers = 6 ( x + 2 ) = 6 x + 12 = ( x − 3 ) + ( x − 1 ) + ( x + 1 ) + ( x + 3 ) + ( x + 5 ) + ( x + 7 ) \begin{array}{l} =6(x+2)=6 x+12 \\ =(x-3)+(x-1)+(x+1)+(x+3)+(x+5)+(x+7) \end{array} = 6 ( x + 2 ) = 6 x + 12 = ( x − 3 ) + ( x − 1 ) + ( x + 1 ) + ( x + 3 ) + ( x + 5 ) + ( x + 7 ) ​ The smallest odd integer is ( x − 3 ) (x-3) ( x − 3 )

Nikolai is thinking of a positive whole number. If the number is squared and then 10 is subtracted from the result, the difference is equal to 6 . What is the number?
questions.explanation: Let, the number is x x x In condition, x 2 − 10 = 6 ⇒ x 2 = 16 ⇒ x = 4 x^{2}-10=6 \Rightarrow x^{2}=16 \Rightarrow x=4 x 2 − 10 = 6 ⇒ x 2 = 16 ⇒ x = 4

questions.question: How many liters of a 40 % 40 \% 40% iodine solution need to be mixed with 35 liters of a 20 % 20 \% 20% iodine solution to create a 35 % \mathbf{3 5 \%} 35% iodine solution?
On the farm, there are a total of 20 animals, all of which are either cows or chickens. There are 52 legs total. How many chicken are on the farm, assuming each animal has all of its legs?Question
questions.explanation: ধরি, chickens আছে x x x টি এবং cows আছে ( 20 − x (20-x ( 20 − x টি) প্রশ্নমতে, 2 x + 4 ( 20 − x ) = 52 2 x+4(20-x)=52 2 x + 4 ( 20 − x ) = 52 ⇒ 2 x + 80 − 4 x = 52 ⇒ − 2 x = 52 − 80 ⇒ − 2 x = − 28 ⇒ x = 14 \begin{array}{l} \Rightarrow 2 x+80-4 x=52 \\ \Rightarrow-2 x=52-80 \Rightarrow-2 x=-28 \Rightarrow x=14 \end{array} ⇒ 2 x + 80 − 4 x = 52 ⇒ − 2 x = 52 − 80 ⇒ − 2 x = − 28 ⇒ x = 14 ​

questions.explanation: ধরি, মোট এক টাকার নোট = x = 5 =x=5 = x = 5 টাকার নোট = 10 =10 = 10 টাকার নোট ∴ x + 5 x + 10 x = 192 ⇒ 16 x = 192 ∴ x = 12 \begin{array}{l} \therefore \mathrm{x}+5 \mathrm{x}+10 \mathrm{x}=192 \Rightarrow 16 \mathrm{x}=192 \\ \therefore \mathrm{x}=12 \end{array} ∴ x + 5 x + 10 x = 192 ⇒ 16 x = 192 ∴ x = 12 ​ ∴ \therefore ∴ মোট নোটের পরিমাণ = 3 × 12 = 36 =3 \times 12=36 = 3 × 12 = 36

questions.question: The area of trapezoid in square units?
questions.explanation: মনে করি, A E = 4 \mathrm{AE}=4 AE = 4 এবং B হতে CD এর উপর BF লম্ব আকি । তাই B F = 4 \mathrm{BF}=4 BF = 4 . এখন আবার △ A D E \triangle \mathrm{ADE} △ ADE হতে, D E 2 = 5 2 − 4 2 \mathrm{DE}^{2}=5^{2}-4^{2} DE 2 = 5 2 − 4 2 △ B F C \triangle \mathrm{BFC} △ BFC হতে , F C 2 = 5 2 − 4 2 \mathrm{FC}^{2}=5^{2}-4^{2} FC 2 = 5 2 − 4 2 ∴ D E = 3 \therefore \mathrm{DE}=3 ∴ DE = 3 ∴ F C = 3 \therefore \mathrm{FC}=3 ∴ FC = 3 ADCB ট্রাপিজিয়ামের ক্ষেত্রেফল = Δ =\Delta = Δ - ক্ষেত্র A D E + A E F B \mathrm{ADE}+\mathrm{AEFB} ADE + AEFB আয়তক্ষেত্রের ক্ষেত্রফল + Δ +\Delta + Δ - ক্ষেত্র BFC = ( 1 2 × 3 × 4 ) + ( 4 × 10 ) + 1 2 × 3 × 4 = 6 + 40 + 6 = 52 =\left(\frac{1}{2} \times 3 \times 4\right)+(4 \times 10)+\frac{1}{2} \times 3 \times 4=6+40+6=52 = ( 2 1 ​ × 3 × 4 ) + ( 4 × 10 ) + 2 1 ​ × 3 × 4 = 6 + 40 + 6 = 52 square unit.

questions.question: In 40 minutes, Diane walks 2.5 miles and Sue walks 1.5 miles. In miles per hour, how much faster is Diane walking?
questions.explanation: 40 মিনিটে Diane यায় 2.5 miles ∴ 60 " " 2.5 × 60 40 " = 3.75  miles.  \therefore 60 \quad " \quad " \frac{2.5 \times 60}{40} "=3.75 \text { miles. } ∴ 60 " " 40 2.5 × 60 ​ " = 3.75  miles.  আবার, 40 মিনিটে Sue যায় 1.5 miles ∴ 60 " " 1.5 × 60 40 " = 2.25  miles.  \therefore 60 \quad " \quad " \frac{1.5 \times 60}{40} "=2.25 \text { miles. } ∴ 60 " " 40 1.5 × 60 ​ " = 2.25  miles.  Diane is faster = ( 3.75 − 2.25 ) = 1.5 =(3.75-2.25)=1.5 = ( 3.75 − 2.25 ) = 1.5 miles per hr
